item.title: Gunfu Heroes
item.description: Background In the year 21xx, the show GunFu Heroes’ ratings have declined. In a desperate ploy to revitalize the show’s former glory, the show’s executives have started “recruiting” fighters from across both time and space. Prove your worth in the arena with an array of weapons and feed the corporate machine with the spoils of war. So what is it? GunFu Heroes is a quick-paced, local multiplayer party game where your goal is to be the last one standing.
